subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
Relocation of Business
lead_paragraph: The Chargers can join the Rams in Los Angeles or negotiate for a new stadium in San Diego. The Raiders can join the Rams if the Chargers decline, stay in Oakland or choose to move somewhere else.
snippet: The Chargers can join the Rams in Los Angeles or negotiate for a new stadium in San Diego. The Raiders can join the Rams if the Chargers decline, stay in Oakland or choose to move somewhere else.
